system.description:
Makeshift armor coated in toxic materials which are hazardous to the health of any who seeks to inflict harm upon the robot or its companions.

Special: When a melee attack is made against a location fitted with noxious plate, and the attacker suffers a complication, then the attacker suffers 2 @fos[DC] Persistent (Poison) damage. In addition, melee attacks made using arms fitted with serrated plate gain the Persistent (Poison) damage effect.
